00022 #define TO_RAD PI/180
00023 #define PIECE_MOVING_SPEED 0.25
00024 
00025 Player::Player()
00026 {
00027   next_piece1    = NULL;
00028   next_piece2    = NULL;
00029 
00030   current_piece1 = NULL;
00031   current_piece2 = NULL;
00032 
00033   srand(CL_System::get_time());
00034 
00035   key_change_angle = new KeyboardKey(CL_KEY_UP    , true );
00036   key_left         = new KeyboardKey(CL_KEY_LEFT  , true );
00037   key_right        = new KeyboardKey(CL_KEY_RIGHT , true );
00038 }
00039 
00040 Player::~Player()
00041 {
00042   delete key_change_angle;
00043   delete key_left;
00044   delete key_right;
00045 }
00046 
00047 void Player::new_game()
00048 {
00049   CommonResources *resources = common_resources_get_instance();
00050 
00051   angle = 0.0;
00052 
00053   position = 2;
00054   position_bis = 1;
00055 
00056   x = position * resources->pieces_width + (position_bis )*resources->pieces_width/2;
00057 
00058   current_piece1 = new Piece(rand()%3);
00059   current_piece2 = new Piece(rand()%3);
00060 
00061   next_piece1 = new Piece(rand()%3);
00062   next_piece2 = new Piece(rand()%3);
00063   
00064   // Apply skin
00065   int value;
00066   value = next_piece1 -> get_piece_number();
00067   
00068   next_piece1 -> set_sprites(pieces_normal[value], pieces_appearing[value],
00069                                pieces_disappearing[value], pieces_mini[value]);
00070   
00071   value = next_piece2 -> get_piece_number();
00072   next_piece2 -> set_sprites(pieces_normal[value], pieces_appearing[value],
00073                                pieces_disappearing[value], pieces_mini[value]);
00074   
00075   value = current_piece1 ->  get_piece_number();
00076   current_piece1 -> set_sprites(pieces_normal[value], pieces_appearing[value],
00077                                   pieces_disappearing[value], pieces_mini[value]);
00078   
00079   value = current_piece2 ->  get_piece_number();
00080   current_piece2 -> set_sprites(pieces_normal[value], pieces_appearing[value],
00081                                   pieces_disappearing[value], pieces_mini[value]);
00082 
00083 
00084   next_piece1 -> set_position(next_left, next_top);
00085   next_piece2 -> set_position(next_left+((resources->pieces_width)/2),next_top);
00086 }
00087 
00088 void Player::load_gfx(std::string skin)
00089 {
00090   CommonResources *resources = common_resources_get_instance();
00091 
00092   CL_Zip_Archive zip(skin);
00093   CL_ResourceManager gfx_pieces("pieces.xml", &zip, false);
00094 
00095   Preferences *pref = pref_get_instance();
00096   
00097   // First we load the sprites
00098   for(int i = 1; i<=NUMBER_OF_PIECES; ++i)
00099   {
00100     if(pref -> colorblind)
00101       pieces_normal[i-1] = new CL_Sprite("pieces/piece_"+to_string(i)+"/normal-color-blind", &gfx_pieces);
00102     else
00103       pieces_normal[i-1] = new CL_Sprite("pieces/piece_"+to_string(i)+"/normal", &gfx_pieces);
00104 
00105     pieces_appearing[i-1] = new CL_Sprite("pieces/piece_"+to_string(i)+"/appear", &gfx_pieces);
00106     pieces_disappearing[i-1] = new CL_Sprite("pieces/piece_"+to_string(i)+"/disappear", &gfx_pieces);
00107     
00108     if(pref -> colorblind)
00109       pieces_mini[i-1] = new CL_Sprite("pieces/piece_"+to_string(i)+"/little-color-blind", &gfx_pieces);
00110     else
00111       pieces_mini[i-1] = new CL_Sprite("pieces/piece_"+to_string(i)+"/little", &gfx_pieces);
00112    
00113   }
00114 
00115   CL_ResourceManager gfx("gfx.xml", &zip, false);
00116   next_left = CL_Integer_to_int("game/next_left", &gfx);
00117   next_top = CL_Integer_to_int("game/next_top", &gfx);
00118 
00119   game_top = CL_Integer_to_int("game/top", &gfx);
00120   game_left = CL_Integer_to_int("game/left", &gfx); 
00121   zone_top = CL_Integer_to_int("zone_top", &gfx);
00122 
00123   // c² = a²+b³
00124   current_pieces_r = resources->pieces_width/2;
00125 
00126 
00127   // Then, we apply new sprites
00128   if(next_piece1 && next_piece2 && current_piece1 && current_piece2)
00129   {
00130     int value;
00131     value = next_piece1 -> get_piece_number();
00132   
00133     next_piece1 -> set_sprites(pieces_normal[value], pieces_appearing[value],
00134                                pieces_disappearing[value], pieces_mini[value]);
00135   
00136     value = next_piece2 -> get_piece_number();
00137     next_piece2 -> set_sprites(pieces_normal[value], pieces_appearing[value],
00138                                pieces_disappearing[value], pieces_mini[value]);
00139   
00140     value = current_piece1 ->  get_piece_number();
00141     current_piece1 -> set_sprites(pieces_normal[value], pieces_appearing[value],
00142                                   pieces_disappearing[value], pieces_mini[value]);
00143   
00144     value = current_piece2 ->  get_piece_number();
00145     current_piece2 -> set_sprites(pieces_normal[value], pieces_appearing[value],
00146                                   pieces_disappearing[value], pieces_mini[value]);
00147 
00148     next_piece1 -> set_position(next_left, next_top);
00149     next_piece2 -> set_position(next_left+((resources->pieces_width)/2),next_top);
00150   }
00151 
00152   // And to the board too
00153   board.apply_skin(pieces_normal, pieces_appearing, pieces_disappearing, pieces_mini);
00154 
00155 }

00157 void Player::unload_gfx()
00158 {
00159   // Delete the pieces sprites
00160   for(int i = 0; i<NUMBER_OF_PIECES; ++i)
00161   {
00162     if(pieces_normal[i])
00163     {
00164       delete pieces_normal[i];
00165       pieces_normal[i] = NULL;
00166     }
00167     if(pieces_appearing[i])
00168     {
00169       delete pieces_appearing[i];
00170       pieces_appearing[i] = NULL;
00171     }
00172     if(pieces_disappearing[i])
00173     {
00174       delete pieces_disappearing[i];
00175       pieces_disappearing[i] = NULL;
00176     }
00177     if(pieces_mini[i])
00178     {
00179       delete pieces_mini[i];
00180       pieces_mini[i] = NULL;
00181     }
00182 
00183   }
00184 }
00185 
00186 void Player::draw()
00187 {
00188   board.draw();
00189 
00190   next_piece1 -> draw_mini();
00191   next_piece2 -> draw_mini();
00192 
00193   CommonResources *resources = common_resources_get_instance();
00194 
00195   current_piece1 -> set_position(game_left+x+cos(angle*TO_RAD)*current_pieces_r,
00196                                  zone_top+resources->pieces_height/2+sin((angle)*TO_RAD)*current_pieces_r);
00197 
00198   current_piece2 -> set_position(game_left+x+cos((angle+180)*TO_RAD)*current_pieces_r,
00199                                  zone_top+resources->pieces_height/2+sin((angle+180)*TO_RAD)*current_pieces_r);
00200      
00201   current_piece1 -> draw();
00202   current_piece2 -> draw();
00203 }
00204 
00205 void Player::events()
00206 {
00207   // Change the order of the pieces 
00208   if(key_change_angle->get())
00209   {
00210     change_angle();
00211   }
00212 
00213   // Look the key to know if we have to move the pieces to the left
00214   if(key_left->get())
00215   {
00216     move_left();
00217   }
00218 
00219   // Look the key to know if we have to move the pieces to the right
00220   if(key_right->get())
00221   {
00222     move_right();
00223   }
00224 }
00225 
00226 void Player::change_angle()
00227 {
00228    // Change the order of the pieces 
00229   if(target_angle<=target_angle+90)
00230   {     
00231     target_angle += 90;
00232     placed = false;
00233 
00234     if((target_angle%180 == 90))
00235     {
00236       position_bis = 0;
00237     }
00238     else
00239     {
00240       if(position == NUMBER_OF_COLS -1)
00241         position --;
00242         
00243       position_bis = 1;
00244     }
00245 
00246   }
00247 }
00248 
00249 void Player::move_left()
00250 {
00251   if(position > 0)
00252   {
00253     old_position = position;
00254     old_position_bis = position_bis;
00255     position--;
00256     placed = false;
00257   }
00258 }
00259 
00260 void Player::move_right()
00261 {
00262   if(position < NUMBER_OF_COLS - 1)
00263   {
00264     if(!(position == NUMBER_OF_COLS - 2 && position_bis))
00265     {
00266       old_position = position;
00267       old_position_bis = position_bis;
00268       position++;
00269       placed = false;
00270     }
00271   }
00272 }
00273 
00274 void Player::update()
00275 {
00276   static CommonResources *resources = common_resources_get_instance();
00277 
00278   // Move the pieces if the order has been changed      
00279   if(angle<target_angle)
00280   {
00281     angle += resources->time_interval * 0.35;
00282     if(angle>=target_angle)
00283     {
00284       while(target_angle>=360)
00285       {
00286         target_angle-=360;             
00287       }
00288       angle = target_angle;
00289     }
00290   }
00291   
00292   // Move the pieces to the right
00293   if(!placed)
00294   {
00295     if(position * resources->pieces_width + position_bis *resources->pieces_width/2 >= x)
00296     {
00297       x += resources->time_interval * PIECE_MOVING_SPEED;
00298       if(x > position * resources->pieces_width + (position_bis )*resources->pieces_width/2)
00299       {
00300         x = position * resources->pieces_width + (position_bis )*resources->pieces_width/2;
00301         placed = true;
00302       }
00303     }
00304   }
00305 
00306   // Move the pieces to the left
00307   if(!placed)
00308   {  
00309     if(position * resources->pieces_width + (position_bis )*resources->pieces_width/2 <= x)
00310     {
00311       x -= resources->time_interval * PIECE_MOVING_SPEED;
00312       if(x < position * resources->pieces_width + (position_bis)*resources->pieces_width/2)
00313       {
00314         x = position * resources->pieces_width + (position_bis)*resources->pieces_width/2;
00315         placed = true;
00316       }
00317     }
00318   }
00319 }
